text: Jejati akasaharu ra je jaminama chan, sabai allahakai sampatti hun. Timile aphno manabhitraka kura prakata gare va luka'e pani, allahale timisamga tyasako hisaba linecha. Ani usale jasala'i cahancha ksama pradana gardacha ra jasala'i cahancha danda dincha ra pratyeka kuramathi allahako sasana cha
